item.title: More Art in Licton Springs
item.description:
You may already be familar with the Light Bulb Bench and Big Tesla located around the Seattle CityLight North Service Center building but earlier this month, two new art works were dedicated by Seattle City Light and the City of Seattle Arts & Culture.

Last week, City Light, in partnership with …
item.dc:creator: amandacrosley

item.title: Big Tesla: where nature and technology meet
item.description: Right to the northwest of Licton Springs park at the Seattle City Light North Service Center lies a beautiful art piece by Merrily Tompkins. The art not only serves as a sign of nicer weather, as flowers bloom from Tesla's head but also serves as a great reminder that technology …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
